name: Noelle
desc: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

elemSkill.name: Breastplate
elemSkill.desc: Summons protective stone armor, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding opponents and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Noelle's DEF. The shield has the following properties: ·When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters. ·Possesses 250% Absorption Efficiency against Geo DMG The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on Noelle's DEF. Noelle is both a dutiful maid and a valiant knight.

elemBurst.name: Sweeping Time
elemBurst.desc: Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the opponents surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing Geo DMG. Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects: ·Larger attack AoE. ·Converts attack DMG to Geo DMG that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. ·Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF. Sometimes, it's not just dust that needs sweeping...

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Maid
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash. 

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

c13ns.name: I Got Your Back
c13ns.desc: While <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> and <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color> are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

c13ns.name: Combat Maid
c13ns.desc: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

c13ns.name: Invulnerable Maid
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: To Be Cleaned
c13ns.desc: When <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color>'s duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.

c13ns.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Must Be Spotless
c13ns.desc: <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.\nAdditionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.
